name: Picked apart
description:
Overview:

This game is a coin collecting game were the level is randomly generated. Your goal is to obtain number of required coins to finish the level.

===============================================================

Controls:

WASD = movement

Spacebar = Jump

Shif/left mouse t = Dash

Control/ right mouse = Down Dash

===============================================================

Development Team:

Nicolas Delgado(Programmer) https://github.com/Pitifulcube92

Felipe Martinez(3D, Art Assets)
